All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Alix
    An Alix object is a wrapper around a Lucene index with lexical tools, to be shared across a complex application (ex: web servlet).
    AlixReuseStrategy
    Reuse strategy of Analyzer.TokenStreamComponents in Alix: no cache for indexation, reuse for query parsing.
    AnalyzerReuseControl
    This analyzer wrap another and allow to force its Analyzer.ReuseStrategy.
    BinaryInts
    Data structure to write and read ints in a binary form suited for stored field StoredField(String, BytesRef), Document.getBinaryValue(String) or binary fields BinaryDocValuesField, BinaryDocValues.
    BinaryUbytes
    Data structure to write and read unsigned bytes (0-255) in a binary form suited for stored field StoredField(String, BytesRef), Document.getBinaryValue(String) or binary fields BinaryDocValuesField, BinaryDocValues.
    BitsFromQuery
    A query giving results as bits.
    Calcul  
    Chain
    A mutable string implementation thought for efficiency more than security.
    ChainRoller
    Efficient Object to handle a sliding window of mutable String (Chain), Works like a circular array that you can roll on a token line.
    Char
    Efficient character categorizer, about 500x faster than Character.is*(), optimized for tokenizer in latin scripts.
    CharsAtt
    An implementation of Lucene CharTermAttribute designed to be an efficient key in an HashMap, and with tools for char manipulation (ex: capitalize).
    CharsAttWin
    Used in a Lucene Analyzer, a LIFO stack of terms to keep trace of tokens for compounds.
    CharsDic
    A dictionary optimized for lucene analysis using CharsAtt as key.
    CharsLemAtt  
    CharsLemAttImpl  
    CharsOrthAtt
    A recast of CharsAtt
    CharsOrthAttImpl
    Custom CharTermAttribute used to normalize an orthographic form of a token.
    CollectorBits
    Collect found document as at set of docids in a bitSet.
    CombineMaps
    Classe de méthodes qui combinent les nouvelles données des auteurs/dates/titres aux données déjà existantes Les méthodes de la classe ont besoin de la map de stats auteur/date déjà existante et de la liste des stats par titre Après utilisation, la map des données statistiques pour chaque auteur est mise à jour, sous forme de map combinée
    Compound
    A mutable String used to merge compunds words.
    Cooc
    A co-occurrences scanner in a TextField of a lucene index.
    Corpus
    This object handle information of a “corpus” : a set of docId in a lucene index.
    CorpusQuery
    Query with a document iterator backed on a BitSet (the corpus).
    CsvReader
    A light fast csv parser without Strings, especially to load jar resources.
    DicBalance
    Merge two dictionaries entries and keep counts
    DicBytes
    A dictionary of terms with frequencies, for lucene.
    DicFreq
    A specialized table for a dictionary of terms, with an int code, an int counter, and an int tag.
    DicVek
    A data structure for sparse matrix of terms, optimized for cosine similarity.
    Dir  
    Doc
    Tools to display a document
    DoubleList  
    ExportData  
    Facet
    A dedicated dictionary for facets, to allow similarity scores.
    FrAnalyzer
    Analysis scenario for French in Alix.
    FrDics
    Preloaded word List for lucene indexation in HashMap.
    FrDics.LexEntry  
    FrDics.NameEntry  
    Freqs  
    FrTokenizer
    A Lucene tokenizer for XML/html (and French).
    FrTokenLem
    A lucene token filter adding other channels to the token stream an orthographic form (normalized) in a CharsOrthAtt a lemma in a CharsLemAtt a pos as a lucene int flag FlagsAttribute (according to the semantic of Tag
    HelloTag
    Test if tag lib is working.
    HiliteFormatter
    Creates a formatted snippet from the top passages.
    IntIntMap
    An efficient int-int Map implementation, encoded in a long array for key and value.
    IntList
    A mutable list of ints.
    IntOMap<E>
    An efficient int-Object Map implementation. source: http://java-performance.info/implementing-world-fastest-java-int-to-int-hash-map/
    IntPair
    A mutable pair of ints.
    IntRoller
    Efficient Object to handle a sliding window of ints.
    IntSeries
    Retrieve all values of an int field, store it in docId order, calculate some statistics.
    IntTuple
    A non mutable list of ints, designed to be a good key in an Hashmap.
    IntVector
    A mutable list of ints with useful metadata, for example to calculate average.
    JspTools
    Jsp toolbox.
    Lexer
    Rules to correct an occurrence chain according to context.
    Lexik
    Preloaded list of words Lists are not too big, should not be a problem for memory.
    Lexik.LexEntry  
    Lexik.NameEntry  
    LongTuple
    A fixed list of longs, useful in arrays to be sorted.
    Marker
    A light hiliter using a Lucene analyzer and a compiled automaton, designed for short texts (ex: show found words when searching in titles).
    MetaAnalyzer  
    MetaTokenizer  
    ML
    Some useful tools to deal with “Markup Languages” (xml, but also html tag soup)
    Obvil
    In an MVC model, this servlet is the global controller for Obvil app.
    Occ
    A Token in a text flow with different properties.
    OccChain
    A specialized data structure for word flow.
    OccList
    A sequence of mutable Occs.
    OccRoller
    A sliding window of tokens
    Offsets
    Data structure to write and read the “offsets” of a document Offsets are start and end index of tokens in the source CharSequence (the text).
    Profiler  
    Queries
    La classe contient les méthodes qui ramassent les fichiers, appellent le tokenizer et appellent le classe de compilation des données Les méthodes de la classe ont besoin des demandes de l'utilisateur, et modifient au fur et à mesure la map des données pour chaque auteur Après utilisation, la map des données statistiques pour chaque auteur est mise à jour
    Query
    A query builder of Occ events TODO document query syntax Possible backtracking silences "A A B B", "A * B" » will not fire 2x Idea, the shortest path size (**=0, OR=shortest)
    Rail
    A flatten version of a term vector for a document field.
    Roller
    Efficient Object to handle a sliding window, on different types, works like a circular array.
    SAXIndexer
    An XML parser allowing to ndex XML or HTMTL.
    Scale
    Handle data to display results as a chronology, according to subset of an index, given as a bitset.
    Scale.Tick
    A row of data for a crossing axis
    Scorer
    Interface for a scorer, similar to tf-idf.
    ScorerBM25  
    ScorerOccs  
    ScorerTf  
    ScorerTfidf  
    ScorerTheme  
    SimilarityOccs  
    SimilarityTheme  
    SparseMat
    A sparse matrix to record vectors
    SparseMat.Counter  
    StemTrie
    A Trie of words to store compounds expressions with different properties
    Tag
    Jeu d’étiquettes morphosyntaxique pour le français.
    Tag.TagFilter
    A filter for different pos code, implemented as a BitSet;
    TermList
    An object to store lucene terms with a frequency indice.
    Test  
    TestEnd
    An always false test, especially used as a default end of chain test
    TestGap
    Zero or n words, except sentence punctuation
    TestLem  
    TestOr
    Do not works well for now, no backtracking of things like that (A B, A C) will not find "A C" TODO: a query compilator, transforming (A B, D B, A C, D C) » (A (B, C), D (B, C))
    TestOrth  
    TestOrthTag  
    TestOrthTagPrefix  
    TestStop
    Zero or more stop words
    TestTag  
    TestTagPrefix  
    TestTerm  
    TestTrue
    An always true test, any word, for example "*"
    TokenCompound
    Plug behind TokenLem
    TokenFlagFilter
    A token Filter selecting tokens by flag values.
    TokenLemCloud
    A final token filter before indexation, to plug after a lemmatizer filter, providing most significant tokens for word cloud.
    TokenLemFull
    A token Filter to plug after a TokenLem filter, overriding positions with lemma and POS
    TokenStats
    A token filter counting tokens.
    Top<E>
    A queue to select the top elements according to a float score.
    Top.Entry<E>
    A mutable pair (rank, Object), used in the data array of the top queue.
    TopTerms
    An iterator for sorted list of terms
    UserInterface
    Classe d'interface utilisation (les demandes sont faites et les queries enregistrées) Les informations de base d'entrée tsv de l'utilisateur sont enregistrées dans cette classe
    WordsAutomatonBuilder
    Because Lucene DaciukMihovAutomatonBuilder is final and can't be extended...
    XMLIndexer
    A worker for parallel indexing.
